result.execSummary:
The defendant Lucas M Campion was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Dane County Clerk of Circuit Court

miscConds.notes: $268 to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.  $250 DNA surcharge remitted.
Defendant shall not threaten or direct any acts of physical violence toward MB.

Defendant shall complete a risk and needs assessment and comply with care plan goals related to prioritized need areas identified.  Defendant advised of requirement to provide DNA sample.  State will not object to termination of probation after 18 months if any recommended treatment is completed, has no formal ATR's and no new arrests rising to level of probable cause found by magistrate.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lucas M Campion

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

Defendant's copy of Civil Judgment for Unpaid Court Obligations returned.  No forwarding address.
Final Reminder Notice returned - no forwarding address.
Plea Questionnaire & Waiver of Rights.  Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief.  Judgment of conviction prepared.

ADDRESS INFO for Lucas M Campion
Current: 832 W Main St, Stoughton, WI 53589 United States  (Effective: 06-25-2015)
Prior: 315 Devonshire Rd, Stoughton, WI 53589
Preliminary hearing on July 7, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release.
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with Melissa B.
- Defendant shall not be in the 300 block of Devonshire Rd in Stoughton, WI.
- The court orders a signature bond in the amount of $500.00 per case on the condition that the defendant reports to, and complies with, Dane County Bail Monitoring (DCBM).  The defendant shall report to DCBM by 10:00 A.M. on the business day following his/her release from jail.  If defendant fails to comply with DCBM, cash bail is automatically set in the amount of $1500.00 (per case), as higher cash bail is necessary to assure appearance in court. BMP is removed as condition of bond.
Defendant did not waive the time limits for Preliminary Hearing.
Trial judge - Br 5

Defendant in court, in custody with Attorney  State Public Defender.  Jason D. Sanders appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading.  Defendant stood mute.  Court entered not guilty plea as to any misdemeanor counts.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 7, 2015 at 09:00 am.
